__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Ores and Minerals

pages.text: Beneath the overworld, you will still find ore veins to exploit. It is important to note that $(thing)Netherrack$() does not collapse, like raw stone would. However, $(thing)Blackstone$(), $(thing)Nether Bricks$(), $(thing)Cobblerack$() and miscellaneous other blocks do. Prospecting will still work Beneath the overworld.

pages.name: Nether Gold
pages.text: Nether Gold replaces netherrack, and is common. Beneath lava, there is more gold, and richer.

pages.name: Cursecoal
pages.text: Cursecoal is a powerful $(l:beneath/hellforge)fuel$(). It replaces netherrack above level 80.

pages.name: Sylvite
pages.text: Sylvite replaces basalt at any level.

pages.name: Nether Quartz
pages.text: Nether Quartz replaces netherrack at all levels, and is common.

pages.name: Slimed Netherrack
pages.text: Slimed Netherrack occasionally replaces Netherrack above lava level.
